Winter's Herald.Rank 1 Prerequisites: Frost Touched, Expert Athletics or Survival

Smith.Rank 1 Effect: You may create Simple Weapons for $1000, Light Shields for $1,500, and Light Armor for $4,000.
Smith.Rank 2 Effect: You may create Fine Weapons for $2,000, Helmets for $1,125, Heavy Shields for $2,250 and Heavy Armor for $5,000.

Signature Manipulations.Rank 1 Effect: Select a Rank 1 Power Manipulation. This Manipulation maybe used twice per Scene without spending AP to activate.
Signature Manipulations.Rank 2 Effect: Select a Rank 1 Power Manipulation. This Manipulation maybe used twice per Scene without spending AP to activate. OR Select a Rank 2 power Manipulation. This Manipulation may be used once per Scene without activating Authentic Thaumaturgy's Frequency.

Sign Mastery.Rank 3 Prerequisites: All your Patron’s Major Gifts, GM Permission

Shared Strengths.Rank 1 Effect: You gain access to your Legendary Form’s Abilities while in your Avatar form.
Shared Strengths.Rank 2 Effect: You gain your Legendary Form’s Types while in your Avatar Form
Shared Strengths.Rank 3 Effect: You gain access to your Legendary Form’s Move List while in your Avatar Form.

Seed Bag.Rank 1 Prerequisites: Botany Research Field, Green Thumb, Adept General Education or Adept Survival
Seed Bag.Rank 2 Prerequisites: Master General Education or Master Survival
Seed Bag.Rank 1 Effect: You become adept at harvesting Seeds and Spores from Pokémon. You may target a willing Grass-Type Pokémon that knows Sleep Powder, Stun Spore, or Poison Powder. Add this move to your Move list for the remainder of the day. You may not use Seed Bag to have multiple instances of the same move in your Move list. Seed Bag may be used twice per day per Rank.
Seed Bag.Rank 2 Effect: You may also harvest Cotton Spore, Leech Seed, Spore, or Worry Seed.

Rock Power.Rank 1 Prerequisites: Stone Warrior, Adept Combat or Survival

In My Name.Rank 2 Prerequisites: Completed a task on behalf of your Patron, GM Permission

Fire Breather.Rank 1 Prerequisites: Fire Bringer, Expert Focus or Combat

Earth Mother's Blessing.Rank 1 Prerequisites: Earth Shaker, Adept Focus or Intuition
Earth Mother's Blessing.Rank 2 Prerequisites: Ground Out, Master Focus or Intuition

Advanced Capture Techniques.Rank 2 Prerequisites: Capture Specialist, any 2 Skills at Adept Rank
Advanced Capture Techniques.Rank 3 Prerequisites: Capture Specialist, any 2 Skills at Expert Rank
Advanced Capture Techniques.Rank 4 Prerequisites: Capture Specialist, any 3 Skills at Expert Rank
